Start.startSubtitle: This application is created to help you saving food.

Settings.clearTheDatabaseModal: Do you really want to clean the database?

Payment.paymentFooterText1: The foundation you wanted to support is missing? No worries! It's
Payment.paymentInfo1: Select and tap the tile with the charity to which you want to donate the equivalent of wasted food.
Payment.paymentInfo2: After making donation, return to the application and click the „Donation sent!” button to pay for the products in the application.
Payment.paymentInfo3: Optionally, you can also fill field with an e-mail address to which we will send thanks.
